channel.title: Access Denied?!?!?!
channel.description:
Ok so when i download cache it doesnt extract it becuz it doesnt have permission? how to fix! here the error :
java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Users\MyPc\LegacyXPVPZ (Access is denied) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:138) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:97) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(FileReader.java:58) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:176) at client.startUp(client.java:8302) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:84) at client.run(client.java:5291) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:724)

item.title: Access Denied?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

that’s pretty strange. You don’t have access to edit your root directory. Try moving the cache (with signlink of course ) to the c:/ instead.

Read full topic

item.title: Access Denied?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

You can’t open and read a directory as far as I know? The only way I think may work is using isFile & isDirectory() and use list() / listFiles() to get content.

Alternatively the file may be locked though (right click on the file then click properties)

I might just be jabbering shit though

Read full topic
